Text: The only remaining cast member is Rowan Atkinson. The rest of the cast was changed, as was the Blackadder character, for the first series. As for bad quality and synch errors, that is because this is an unreleased pilot. GKG I'm sorry if this rarity offended your delicate sensibilties. Stay away from my torrents in future.
Edmund, Percy and the Queen remained for the first series - McAngus as well, but just for one episode
